cause.description:
The Leary Firefighters Foundation was founded by actor Denis Leary in response to the devastating loss of six firefighters in a 1999 warehouse fire in his hometown of Worcester, Massachusetts. One of these firefighters was Mr. Leary's cousin and another was a close childhood friend. While helping his community deal with that tragedy, Mr. Leary learned that there was a profound need for private aid to help fire departments obtain essential equipment, technology and training - funding which local governments struggle to provide.
1. Bridging the gap between what departments need and gov't can afford
cause.mission: Dedicated to bridging the gap between what departments need and gov't can afford to provide departments with the most up-to-date equipment, technology and training
cause.name: Leary FireFighters Foundation
